content: झ {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {@--1@} Asleep, sleeping. {@--2@} Lost, destroyed. --झः {@--1@} Beating time. {@--2@} Jingling, clanking or any similar sound. {@--3@} Wind accompanied by rain. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of Bṛhaspati. {@--5@} A thing lost or mislaid. {@--6@} A hurricane. --झा The descent of a cascade, waterfall.
